Name: Conan
Aliases: Conan the Cimmerian; Conan the Barbarian; Conan the King; King Conan; Conan the Destroyer; Conan the Renegade; Amra.
Relatives: Greshan (mother, deceased); Conaldar (father, deceased); Connacht (grandfather, deceased).
Origin: Conan was born on a battlefield, the son of a village blacksmith. Conan matured quickly as a youth and, by age fifteen, he was already a respected warrior who had participated in the destruction of the Aquilonian outpost of Venarium. After its destruction, he was struck by wanderlust and he roamed throughout the Hyborian Age nations as a thief, outlaw, mercenary and pirate.  encountering skulking monsters, evil wizards, tavern wenches, and beautiful princesses.
